tool_description: The API generates personalized trip plans based on the user's specified number of days and location. Using AI, the system recommends popular tourist attractions, local experiences, and accommodations based on user preferences and past travel behavior. The generated trip plans can be customized and adjusted to suit the user's needs, making it a valuable tool for anyone planning a trip.
name: AI Trip Planner
title: AI Trip Planner

api_list.name: Get Trip Plan
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to generate trip plan based on no. of days and destination.

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.
